title: West Midlands Police questioned by MPs on Maccabi-Villa match fan ban
description: MPs write to police over Maccabi Tel Aviv fans' ban from Thursday's match against Aston Villa.
content:
A police force preparing to mount a major operation for the Maccabi Tel Aviv match against Aston Villa has been asked by MPs to explain its decision to ban away fans from attending.
More than 700 officers will be on the streets of Birmingham for Thur... [2017 chars]

title: XL bully killed nine-month-old baby boy in Roggiet home
description: Gwent Police said the dog involved was a six-year-old XL bully that had been officially registered.
content:
The dog that killed a nine-month-old baby boy in south-east Wales was an XL bully, police have confirmed.
Gwent Police said the six-year-old dog was registered and that a certificate of exemption was issued in 2024, before a ban on the breed was intr... [1256 chars]
